name: YRC Bookmarks Archive
summary: Learn about .YRCBKM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create a YRCBKM file, you'll first need to create Weblink Bookmark. In the browser, select the gear icon in the top-right corner and select Bookmark It from the menu.
Now, to create the YRCBKM file, select the gear icon in the top-right of the browser, select Bookmarks from the menu, click Export, choose the save location, name the file, and click Export.

To create the YRCBKM file, select the gear icon in the top-right of the browser, select Bookmarks from the menu, click Import, choose your YRCBKM file from its location, click Open, then click Import.

description: Archive created by Weblink, a Windows web browser; contains one or more bookmarks of webpages that have been designated in the Weblink browser.
